revised_title: The Particle Aspect of Meson Theory: Emphasizing the Similarity to Dirac's Equation of the Electron
tldr: The author presents a new perspective on meson theory, emphasizing the particle aspect and highlighting the similarity to Dirac's equation of the electron. This approach provides a clearer understanding of the particle aspect of mesons, including their spin, non-relativistic wave mechanics, and the relation between observables and probability distributions.
